msItem.title: Fawa'id-i Safawiyyah.
msItem.note: Donations Register for May 19 1827. First front flyleaf, recto: Presented by Sir John Malcolm May 19, 1827. A history of the Safavid family from its origin to AH 1216, anf of the rival dynasties that displaced them in the eighteenth century.. Headings and punctuation in red. Written in India for the refugee Safavid prince Sultan Muhammad Mirza.

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather Indian binding with blind-tooled, blind-stamped amd painted decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Iran, the Safavid dynasty, the eighteenth century.
